text:
Um... I guess these are the confirmation items.
Oh, right.

We're going to make new costumes next time,
matching ones for all 283 members.

I wonder what kind of costumes they'll be...
...And also,

What do you wish for,
when I wear the new costumes?

Hehe.
Of course, I'll fulfill that wish.
I'd like to know about the Sakuya you envision.
